FEDPOFFA does not accept Agricultural Science 
and Food & Nutrition.  
FEDPOILA requires ‘O’ level credit pass in 
English Language.  
YABATECH requires ‘O’ level credit passes in 
Mathematics, English Language, Physics, 
Chemistry and any one (1) subject from  
Agricultural Science/Biology, Technical Drawing,  
Auto Mechanic, Metal Work, Woodwork (for Civil 
Engineering Technology), Further M athematics, 
Geography, Economics, Commerce.  
PLS-POLY requires ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, Physics and 
any one (1) from Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural 
Science.  
RUGIPO accepts ‘O’ level pass in English 
Language.  
FEDPO-EDE requires or its equivalent five (5) ‘O’ 
level credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any other 
one (1) subject from Biology, Agricultural 
Science, Further Mathematics, Computer 
Studies, Electrical Installation and Maintenance, 
Work.   
FEDPO-NEK and IBPOLY require at least ‘O’ 
level pass in English Language.  
FEDPO-ILA requires ‘O’ level credit pass in 
English Language.  
FEDPO-NEK requires Chemistry instead of 
Technical Drawing for the UTME Subjects.

passes at not more than two (2) sittings, the 
credits must include Mathematics, Physics,

Science,  Information  Communication
